verses.verse: מִקֵּ֥ץ <WH7093> At the end שֶֽׁבַע־ <WH7651> of [every] seven שָׁנִ֖ים <WH8141> years תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> thou shalt make שְׁמִטָּֽה׃ <WH8059> a release

וְזֶה֮ <WH2088> This דְּבַ֣ר <WH1697> And this [is] the manner הַשְּׁמִטָּה֒ <WH8059> of the release שָׁמ֗וֹט <WH8058> shall release כָּל־ <WH3605> every בַּ֙עַל֙ <WH1167> archer מַשֵּׁ֣ה <WH4874> creditor יָד֔וֹ <WH3027> able אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> what יַשֶּׁ֖ה <WH5383> that lendeth בְּרֵעֵ֑הוּ <WH7453> [ought] unto his neighbour לֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall not יִגֹּ֤שׂ <WH5065> [it] he shall not exact אֶת־ <WH853> רֵעֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH7453> [it] of his neighbour וְאֶת־ <WH853> אָחִ֔יו <WH251> or of his brother כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because קָרָ֥א <WH7121> because it is called שְׁמִטָּ֖ה <WH8059> release לַֽיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD'S

אֶת־ <WH853> הַנָּכְרִ֖י <WH5237> Of a foreigner תִּגֹּ֑שׂ <WH5065> thou mayest exact וַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whatever יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become לְךָ֛ אֶת־ <WH854> is with אָחִ֖יךָ <WH251> [it again] but [that] which is thine with thy brother תַּשְׁמֵ֥ט <WH8058> shall release יָדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3027> thine hand

אֶ֕פֶס <WH657> Save כִּ֛י <WH3588> since לֹ֥א <WH3808> will be no יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become בְּךָ֖ אֶבְי֑וֹן <WH34> when there shall be no poor כִּֽי־ <WH3588> since בָרֵ֤ךְ <WH1288> shall greatly יְבָֽרֶכְךָ֙ <WH1288> bless יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> among you for the LORD בָּאָ֕רֶץ <WH776> thee in the land אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> which יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God נֹֽתֵן־ <WH5414> giveth לְךָ֥ נַחֲלָ֖ה <WH5159> thee [for] an inheritance לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3423> to possess

רַ֚ק <WH7535> but אִם־ <WH518> if שָׁמ֣וֹעַ <WH8085> Only if thou carefully תִּשְׁמַ֔ע <WH8085> hearken בְּק֖וֹל <WH6963> unto the voice יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God לִשְׁמֹ֤ר <WH8104> to observe לַעֲשׂוֹת֙ <WH6213> to do אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַמִּצְוָ֣ה <WH4687> all these commandments הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> likewise אֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> which אָנֹכִ֥י <WH595> I מְצַוְּךָ֖ <WH6680> which I command הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> thee this day

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> For יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> For the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> thy God בֵּֽרַכְךָ֔ <WH1288> blesseth כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> you דִּבֶּר־ <WH1696> thee as he promised לָ֑ךְ וְהַֽעֲבַטְתָּ֞ <WH5670> thee and thou shalt lend גּוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> nations רַבִּ֗ים <WH7227> unto many וְאַתָּה֙ <WH859> you לֹ֣א <WH3808> you will not תַעֲבֹ֔ט <WH5670> but thou shalt not borrow וּמָֽשַׁלְתָּ֙ <WH4910> and thou shalt reign בְּגוֹיִ֣ם <WH1471> nations רַבִּ֔ים <WH7227> over many וּבְךָ֖ לֹ֥א <WH3808> they will not יִמְשֹֽׁלוּ׃ <WH4910> but they shall not reign ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If יִהְיֶה֩ <WH1961> become בְךָ֨ אֶבְי֜וֹן <WH34> If there be among you a poor man מֵאַחַ֤ד <WH259> of one אַחֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH251> of thy brethren בְּאַחַ֣ד <WH259> within any שְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <WH8179> of thy gates בְּאַ֨רְצְךָ֔ <WH776> in thy land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God נֹתֵ֣ן <WH5414> giveth לָ֑ךְ לֹ֧א <WH3808> nor תְאַמֵּ֣ץ <WH553> thee thou shalt not harden אֶת־ <WH853> לְבָבְךָ֗ <WH3824> thine heart וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> nor תִקְפֹּץ֙ <WH7092> nor shut אֶת־ <WH853> יָ֣דְךָ֔ <WH3027> thine hand מֵאָחִ֖יךָ <WH251> brother הָאֶבְיֽוֹן׃ <WH34> from thy poor

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for פָתֹ֧חַ <WH6605> But thou shalt open תִּפְתַּ֛ח <WH6605> wide אֶת־ <WH853> יָדְךָ֖ <WH3027> thine hand ל֑וֹ וְהַעֲבֵט֙ <WH5670> unto him and shalt surely תַּעֲבִיטֶ֔נּוּ <WH5670> lend דֵּ֚י <WH1767> him sufficient מַחְסֹר֔וֹ <WH4270> for his need אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whatever יֶחְסַ֖ר <WH2637> [in that] which he wanteth לֽוֹ׃

הִשָּׁ֣מֶר <WH8104> Beware לְךָ֡ פֶּן־ <WH6435> is no יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become דָבָר֩ <WH1697> that there be not a thought עִם־ <WH5973> in לְבָבְךָ֨ <WH3824> heart בְלִיַּ֜עַל <WH1100> in thy wicked לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying קָֽרְבָ֣ה <WH7126> is at hand שְׁנַֽת־ <WH8141> year הַשֶּׁבַע֮ <WH7651> The seventh שְׁנַ֣ת <WH8141> the year הַשְּׁמִטָּה֒ <WH8059> of release וְרָעָ֣ה <WH7489> be evil עֵֽינְךָ֗ <WH5869> and thine eye בְּאָחִ֙יךָ֙ <WH251> brother הָֽאֶבְי֔וֹן <WH34> against thy poor וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nothing תִתֵּ֖ן <WH5414> and thou givest ל֑וֹ וְקָרָ֤א <WH7121> him nought and he cry עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5921> against אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become בְךָ֖ חֵֽטְא׃ <WH2399> against thee and it be sin

נָת֤וֹן <WH5414> Thou shalt surely תִּתֵּן֙ <WH5414> give ל֔וֹ וְלֹא־ <WH3808> not יֵרַ֥ע <WH7489> shall not be grieved לְבָבְךָ֖ <WH3824> him and thine heart בְּתִתְּךָ֣ <WH5414> when thou givest ל֑וֹ כִּ֞י <WH3588> for בִּגְלַ֣ל ׀ <WH1558> unto him because הַדָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> that for this thing הַזֶּ֗ה <WH2088> this יְבָרֶכְךָ֙ <WH1288> shall bless יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God בְּכָֽל־ <WH3605> all מַעֲשֶׂ֔ךָ <WH4639> thee in all thy works וּבְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all מִשְׁלַ֥ח <WH4916> and in all that thou puttest יָדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3027> thine hand

כִּ֛י <WH3588> for לֹא־ <WH3808> will never יֶחְדַּ֥ל <WH2308> shall never cease אֶבְי֖וֹן <WH34> For the poor מִקֶּ֣רֶב <WH7130> out of הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> the land עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֞ן <WH3651> after that אָנֹכִ֤י <WH595> I מְצַוְּךָ֙ <WH6680> therefore I command לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> thee saying פָּ֠תֹחַ <WH6605> Thou shalt open תִּפְתַּ֨ח <WH6605> wide אֶת־ <WH853> יָדְךָ֜ <WH3027> thine hand לְאָחִ֧יךָ <WH251> unto thy brother לַעֲנִיֶּ֛ךָ <WH6041> to thy poor וּלְאֶבְיֹנְךָ֖ <WH34> and to thy needy בְּאַרְצֶֽךָ׃ <WH776> in thy land ס

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> If יִמָּכֵ֨ר <WH4376> be sold לְךָ֜ אָחִ֣יךָ <WH251> [And] if thy brother הָֽעִבְרִ֗י <WH5680> an Hebrew man א֚וֹ <WH176> or הָֽעִבְרִיָּ֔ה <WH5680> or an Hebrew woman וַעֲבָֽדְךָ֖ <WH5647> unto thee and serve שֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8337> thee six שָׁנִ֑ים <WH8141> years וּבַשָּׁנָה֙ <WH8141> year הַשְּׁבִיעִ֔ת <WH7637> then in the seventh תְּשַׁלְּחֶ֥נּוּ <WH7971> thou shalt let him go חָפְשִׁ֖י <WH2670> free מֵעִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> with

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> When תְשַׁלְּחֶ֥נּוּ <WH7971> And when thou sendest חָפְשִׁ֖י <WH2670> him out free מֵֽעִמָּ֑ךְ <WH5973> with לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תְשַׁלְּחֶ֖נּוּ <WH7971> from thee thou shalt not let him go away רֵיקָֽם׃ <WH7387> empty

הַעֲנֵ֤יק <WH6059> Thou shalt furnish תַּעֲנִיק֙ <WH6059> him liberally ל֔וֹ מִצֹּ֣אנְךָ֔ <WH6629> out of thy flock וּמִֽגָּרְנְךָ֖ <WH1637> and out of thy floor וּמִיִּקְבֶ֑ךָ <WH3342> and out of thy winepress אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> after בֵּרַכְךָ֛ <WH1288> hath blessed יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> [of that] wherewith the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> thy God תִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> thee thou shalt give לֽוֹ׃

וְזָכַרְתָּ֗ <WH2142> And thou shalt remember כִּ֣י <WH3588> for עֶ֤בֶד <WH5650> that thou wast a bondman הָיִ֙יתָ֙ <WH1961> become בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וַֽיִּפְדְּךָ֖ <WH6299> redeemed יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> and the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֞ן <WH3651> after that אָנֹכִ֧י <WH595> I מְצַוְּךָ֛ <WH6680> thee therefore I command אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> thee this thing הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> to day

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> shall come כִּֽי־ <WH3588> if יֹאמַ֣ר <WH559> And it shall be if he say אֵלֶ֔יךָ <WH413> about לֹ֥א <WH3808> I will not אֵצֵ֖א <WH3318> unto thee I will not go away מֵעִמָּ֑ךְ <WH5973> with כִּ֤י <WH3588> because אֲהֵֽבְךָ֙ <WH157> from thee because he loveth וְאֶת־ <WH853> בֵּיתֶ֔ךָ <WH1004> thee and thine house כִּי־ <WH3588> since ט֥וֹב <WH2895> because he is well ל֖וֹ עִמָּֽךְ׃ <WH5973> you

וְלָקַחְתָּ֣ <WH3947> Then thou shalt take אֶת־ <WH853> הַמַּרְצֵ֗עַ <WH4836> an aul וְנָתַתָּ֤ה <WH5414> and thrust בְאָזְנוֹ֙ <WH241> [it] through his ear וּבַדֶּ֔לֶת <WH1817> unto the door וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become לְךָ֖ עֶ֣בֶד <WH5650> and he shall be thy servant עוֹלָ֑ם <WH5769> for ever וְאַ֥ף <WH637> Also לַאֲמָתְךָ֖ <WH519> And also unto thy maidservant תַּעֲשֶׂה־ <WH6213> thou shalt do כֵּֽן׃ <WH3651> likewise

לֹא־ <WH3808> shall not יִקְשֶׁ֣ה <WH7185> It shall not seem hard בְעֵינֶ֗ךָ <WH5869> unto thee בְּשַׁלֵּֽחֲךָ֙ <WH7971> when thou sendest him away אֹת֤וֹ <WH853> חָפְשִׁי֙ <WH2670> free מֵֽעִמָּ֔ךְ <WH5973> with כִּ֗י <WH3588> for מִשְׁנֶה֙ <WH4932> a double שְׂכַ֣ר <WH7939> from thee for he hath been worth שָׂכִ֔יר <WH7916> hired servant עֲבָֽדְךָ֖ <WH5647> [to thee] in serving שֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8337> thee six שָׁנִ֑ים <WH8141> years וּבֵֽרַכְךָ֙ <WH1288> shall bless יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> and the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God בְּכֹ֖ל <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you תַּעֲשֶֽׂה׃ <WH6213> thee in all that thou doest פ

כָּֽל־ <WH3605> all הַבְּכ֡וֹר <WH1060> All the firstling אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> that יִוָּלֵ֨ד <WH3205> that come בִּבְקָרְךָ֤ <WH1241> of thy herd וּבְצֹֽאנְךָ֙ <WH6629> and of thy flock הַזָּכָ֔ר <WH2145> males תַּקְדִּ֖ישׁ <WH6942> thou shalt sanctify לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> thy God לֹ֤א <WH3808> nor תַעֲבֹד֙ <WH5647> thou shalt do no work בִּבְכֹ֣ר <WH1060> with the firstling שׁוֹרֶ֔ךָ <WH7794> of thy bullock וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor תָגֹ֖ז <WH1494> nor shear בְּכ֥וֹר <WH1060> the firstling צֹאנֶֽךָ׃ <WH6629> of thy sheep

לִפְנֵי֩ <WH6440> [it] before יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֤יךָ <WH430> thy God תֹאכֲלֶ֙נּוּ֙ <WH398> Thou shalt eat שָׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> year בְשָׁנָ֔ה <WH8141> by year בַּמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which יִבְחַ֣ר <WH977> shall choose יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> which the LORD אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> You וּבֵיתֶֽךָ׃ <WH1004> thou and thy household

וְכִֽי־ <WH3588> if יִהְיֶ֨ה <WH1961> has ב֜וֹ מ֗וּם <WH3971> And if there be [any] blemish פִּסֵּ֙חַ֙ <WH6455> therein [as if it be] lame א֣וֹ <WH176> or עִוֵּ֔ר <WH5787> or blind כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> any מ֣וּם <WH3971> blemish רָ֑ע <WH7451> [or have] any ill לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תִזְבָּחֶ֔נּוּ <WH2076> thou shalt not sacrifice לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> it unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> thy God

בִּשְׁעָרֶ֖יךָ <WH8179> it within thy gates תֹּאכֲלֶ֑נּוּ <WH398> Thou shalt eat הַטָּמֵ֤א <WH2931> the unclean וְהַטָּהוֹר֙ <WH2889> and the clean יַחְדָּ֔ו <WH3162> [person shall eat it] alike כַּצְּבִ֖י <WH6643> as the roebuck וְכָאַיָּֽל׃ <WH354> and as the hart

רַ֥ק <WH7535> but אֶת־ <WH853> דָּמ֖וֹ <WH1818> the blood לֹ֣א <WH3808> shall not תֹאכֵ֑ל <WH398> Only thou shalt not eat עַל־ <WH5921> on הָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> it upon the ground תִּשְׁפְּכֶ֖נּוּ <WH8210> thereof thou shalt pour כַּמָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> as water פ
